text: (Itarku pinnum) avarkal um'mitam tarkkam ceytal (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka"nan allahvukku murrilum valippattirukkinren; ennaip pinparriyorum (avvare valippattirukkinranar.)" Tavira, vetam kotukkappattoritamum, pamara makkalitamum; "ninkalum (avvare) valippattirkala?" Enru kelum;. Avarkalum (avvare) murrilum valippattal niccayamaka avarkal nerana pataiyai ataintu vittarkal;. Anal avarkal purakkanittu vituvarkalayin (nir kavalaippata ventam,) arivippatutan um mitu katamaiyakum; melum, allah tan atiyarkalai urrukkavanippavanakave irukkinran
